## Private Member Attributes

### CountFrequencies {#ae64eb18c094dc84d5d0394f71503c131}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::map&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint32&#95;t, std::greater&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; &gt; llvm::ProfileSummaryBuilder::CountFrequencies</>}>
We keep track of the number of times a count (block count or samples) appears in the profile.

The map is kept sorted in the descending order of counts.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/profilecommon-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/profilecommon-h">ProfileCommon.h</a>.
